title: Creating a semi-serious ranked team for fun, good times.
body:
Looking for people to join a semi-serious ranked team that me and the founding fathers of our old team are creating.

Our current needs are:
Permanent roles.
- ADC
- MID
- TOP

Reserves.
*We are recruiting players for all roles to join our reserves (you must be able to play at last minute calls).

Requirements:
> - Skype/Curse voice.
- 16+ years of age (or mature).
- Active (6:00-10:00pm) Monday-Friday (NZ Time) & All day on some weekends during tournaments.  
- Able to take constructive criticism from coaches and/or other team members.
- Listen to leaders/shot callers.  
>
*Preferably have gold+ experience (not required).

Application process:
> - Fill out an application form. 
- Wait for response containing your trial game/s.
- Receive final verdict.

Application: 
> 
- Skype name:
- Summoner name:
- Age:
- Basic description of yourself:
- Ranked experience:
- Availability:


*Once enough people are found we will create a pre-made 5v5 (a mass-message will be sent out with a date). From there our coaches will select the best people to move forward. 

EDIT:
*The premade game is currently scheduled for 7:30PM NZST today (17/12/2014). Please check in at/before 7:00PM NZST to get everyone organized. If you can not make this time please let me know prior. Message/add me in-game for anymore information.

replies.body:
Skype name: angi3awesome

        Summoner name: BM Angie

        Age: 16

        Basic description of yourself: I love video games even though I'm a girl. I may not be so pro at it but I really enjoy League of Legends. I have no main role because I love learning all lanes. I am from Sydney, and I started playing league since season 1 but stopped as it got boring playing by myself. I started playing again on May 2013. I may not be good but I would love to use my experience in ranked games as my learning source. My mistakes, plays and knowledge hones my skills.

        Ranked experience: I was Silver 5 last season with 68LP, I stopped when I got bored. I'm still un-ranked this season. I main support in ranked last season since I was forced to duo with my friend.

        Availability: I still have school that starts from 8.20am till 2.30pm (Sydney time) and I get home by 3pm. So I'm available after that until 11pm. I stay as late as I can on Fridays and Saturdays.

Skype name: ryan.addison3

Summoner name: Istezz

Age: 17

Basic description of yourself: I have been playing lol for about 3 years (2 years seriously) I main Jungle, Mid and Adc but can play Top and Support good enough.

Ranked experience: Last season I was silver 1 99lp when season 4 finished, this season I placed Gold 3 after my placements 7w-3l

Availability: I'm able to play whenever really, sometimes I may have appointments with my doctor but other than that I'm good for any time.

Skype name: curse: Daftpinky
Summoner name: Daftpinky
Age: 19
Basic description of yourself: Been playing on and off  league since s2 
Ranked experience: Plat5 currently
Availability: everyday after 6pm

I am a toplaner (master)

Skype name: nicolasnederlandt

Summoner name: youjinbou

Age: 19

Basic description of yourself: I play league since 4 years now . I am from Belgium and i am here to learn english during a gap year before the university :)

Ranked experience: I have already played at every level of ranked : tournament offline/online , i had a diamont 3 team in EUW

Availability: Everytime as long as it is planned. I can be available even if it wasnt planned but then i may need 20-30 minutes to be available.
Jump on http://RetreatHellGaming.com we have plenty of New Zealand and Aussie players wanting to make ranked teams.

Skype name: Grant_730

Curse: Korioko

Summoner name: k0riok0 (they're zero's, not O's)

Age:21

Basic description of yourself: Generally a support, but can do mid or top if necessary as well, not the best adc and with the new patch, just can't jungle haha, but willing to learn if someone would have the patients to teach haha

Ranked experience: Gold 5 currently, go between ranked and normal depending on how my luck is going, if I lose a few, I go to normals or take a break to get a groove back haha

Availability: I only work in the morning and am free most afternoons, I'm in Vic Aus, so the time for me would be around 4 - 8 for your 6 - 10 I think, which I'm all good for

Skype name: keldeothe1st
Summoner name: Dalekvercity
Age: 14
Basic description of yourself: I am a 14 year old Australian. You said 16+ or mature, and I think of myself as quite mature for my age. I run a  monthly twisted treeline tournament but I can happily take a backseat role and let others call the shots. I main top but can play mid if needed. My main top laner is Malphite, main Jg is Volibear, Main mid is Lissandra, main ADC is graves and main support is Sona/Soraka
Ranked experience: I am S5 but I don't play solo queue ranked much
Availability: I am available from the 6-10 pm NZ time (two hours difference I think) except on Wednesday, Half of Thursday and Half of Friday. I can do weekends on Sunday all day and I can organise my Saturday schedule around tournaments If I have a week or two's notice.

> [{quoted}](name=Dalekvercity,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=nPsj46lE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-16T06:16:47.192+0000)

Thank you for your reply. I have added you in game and on Skype.

•Skype name: Snieprince
•Summoner name: Snie
•Age: 23
•Basic description of yourself: I want a team to play team rank while i dont want to play solo rank.
•Ranked experience: gold 5 
•Availability: I cant say which day or time is available for league of legends. But i play a lot of games every day. I spend almost all of my spare time on this game.

*The premade game is currently scheduled for 7:30PM NZST today (17/12/2014). Please check in at/before 7:00PM NZST to get everyone organized. If you can not make this time please let me know prior. Message/add me in-game for anymore information.
Added and spoke to or waiting to speak to everyone.

Skype name: billy.jallad3
Summoner name: moeyondabulk
Age: 17
Basic description of yourself: Hey! I have been playing since may, I got into the game because of a group of mates :). I can fill pretty well in any lane, But I do like playing Orianna :). I'm very friendly, and look forward to making lots of new friends =)!!
Ranked experience: Welllll... I was in bronze 5 for a while but then i managed to get up to bronze 2 :) Ive played over 1000 games im pretty sure ahah
Availability: Anytime just give me a pm on skype or something. Also if you add me ingame im more then happy to have a talk :). {{champion:61}}

•Skype name: alec.chapman6
•Summoner name: chappytheboss
•Age: 22
•Basic description of yourself: been playing league a little over a year now, play very often most afternoons. I enjoy watching streams and reading guides to improve as I enjoy this game a lot. Listen well and looking to get involved in 5's more.
•Ranked experience: Got over 2000 ranked games this season alone, currently have a plat 5 acc, gold 4 and this one is currently gold 2. Was in a gold 4 5's team but left that a while ago been playing solo since.
•Availability: available most afternoons and weekends. Prefference is mid lane and adc

Skype name: Feshile

        Summoner name: oOKira MaiOo

        Age: 23

        Basic description of yourself: I like to play mid and support but I fill decently enough.

        Ranked experience: I play enough ranked though I've stopped recently from falling to Silver 2 :(

        Availability: Always

Skype: choms.ham or Hamtaro
Summoner name: choms
Age: 16
Basic description of myself: I play AD and support, can mid
     I'm understanding of situations if there is a conflict, can listen, I'm a team player
     Have played in a fair share of ranked5s teams.

Ranked Experience: Started play league at the very start of season 2 acheived 1750 elo, am now Diamond5-3

Availability: I am completely available for anything, nothing besides the possible being a 20 minute drive away at a bach for christmas/New years

Basic description of yourself: I mainly look to ADC many people don't like the Adc i prefer to play because she has no  "Getaway" {{champion:22}} I do play other Adcs {{champion:51}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:29}} I can support and mid as well :) ❤ ( Just really wanted to use the champion picture thingy lol)

Ranked experience: I am Gold lV, Teams - Gold l, Silver V and Bronze lV

Availability: Whenever i am needed ❤
